e. Abnormality of an embryonic structure called the apical ectodermal ridge, which helps direct early limb development, may also be involved in this disorder.  Rare cases of Poland syndrome are thought to be caused by a genetic change that can be passed down in families, but no related genes have been identified.",GHR,Poland syndrome
Is Poland syndrome inherited ?,"Most cases of Poland syndrome are sporadic, which means they are not inherited and occur in people with no history of the disorder i
